document.full_text: republican presidential candidate newt gingrich on friday called for more oil drilling in the united states and questioned american aid to pakistan as he took his young campaign to his home state of georgia.
document.title: newt gingrich questions pakistan aid
lines_and_colors: republican presidential candidate newt gingrich on friday called for more oil drilling in the united states and questioned american aid to pakistan as he took his young campaign to his home state of georgia.
